overview: Francis Cholle is an international business consultant with extensive experience across a variety of industries. He lectures at Wharton, Columbia Business School, and HEC, Paris, where he received a Masters in Science of Management. He is also professionally trained in classical music, theater, yoga and clinical psychology. Cholle lives in Los Angeles and New York and enjoys Frenchâ€“American dual citizenship. He is the author of The Intuitive Compass: Why The Best Decisions Balance Reason And Instinct (2011, Jossey Bass)
